entry.title: 我刚写完的作业 My latest project
entry.content:
学习
这个是我刚刚写完的数据新闻作业关于大女主剧的，新闻不是我写的，但是网页是我用D老师和Cursor一起完成的。https://estellazheng1010.github.io/group9project/ Here is my latest project for Data JournalismThis is about China’s ‘Big Heroine’ Dramas. The news was not written by me, but I used cursor with AI to create the webpage .https://estellazheng1010.github.io/group9project/

entry.content:
琐事 记账当然不可能还有中英两版了！手机里下载了一万个记账软件还是不记得要记，但是现在可以趁每日更新网站的时候顺便记个帐了嘻嘻我真是天才

entry.title: 为什么要写两种语言？ Why do I write both Chinese and English
entry.content:
自述
当然是因为… Because…我要考gre啊啊啊啊，还要出国读研（如果能申上），用这种方式锻炼锻炼英语熟悉一下英文环境吧。 I need to take the GRE test!! And I want to go abroad for Master Degree…(If I can)So I have to use this method to train my English skill and make me familiar with the English environment….

entry.title: 今天吃什么？ What did I eat?
entry.content:
琐事
记录每日饮食 Diet Record2025.9.23今天中午吃的拼好饭，哎，晚上因为要改作业就吃了香肠和面包。高级数据新闻你欠我的拿什么还Today I ate some cheap food for lunch… Sadly, as I need to polish our project for Advanced Data Journalism, I only ate sausage and bread for dinner. Oh! My! God! 2025.9.24今天中午也吃的拼好饭，下午去办入职顺便上班到了7点，就把晚饭进化掉了，于是回宿舍之后喝了一杯八宝粥Still cheap food for lunch. I went to the company for onboarding in the afternoon and ended up working until 7.p.m, so I didn’t have dinner. Eventually ,I had a bowl of Eight Treasure Gruel after I arrived my dorm. 2025.9.25今天中午依旧吃的拼好饭，晚上喝了一杯甜啦啦，感觉彻底把晚饭进化掉了Still cheap food for lunch….And had a cup of milk tea in the evening. I think I don’t need to have dinner any more.

entry.title: 好久不见 Nice to meet you
entry.content:
开篇
你终于来了悄悄告诉你这是我们的秘密基地 在这里，你可以知道关于我的一切也可以留下你的足迹 Why do you come here?Do you want to know more about me?Or just want to contact with me?Learn with me ? Here you can find anything you want (Only about me, about Estella).Or share your world with me

entry.title: 健康生活养成记！Healthy Life! Important!
entry.content:
琐事
记录每日睡眠 Sleep Record2025.9.24昨晚睡了三个小时哈哈 好崩溃吧I slept for only three hours last night,haha…..Overwhelmed… 2025.9.25太累了昨天，一下睡了14个小时…..从晚上十点睡到今天中午十二点…好夸张吧Yesterday I was so tired, so I slept for 14 hours last night…from 10.p.m to noon…So crazy…
